lexUnit.name: smile.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an act of smiling; a smiling expression

sentence.text: And anyway , there will be enough public opinion in line with mine and Mike 's here " -- he threw a brilliant smile at Mike -- ` to protect us from too great a loss of circulation .
Swod allowed himself a quarter smile at her recognition but his body was so unused to this display of emotion that he began to cough .
Sophie suppressed a smile at the exchange , and then brother and sister were upon them .
She could n't help but wonder what he was thinking , and allowed herself a sour internal smile at the thought that only she and Ace knew he had to be wrong .
It was a smile for him alone .
She broke away before he could get a stranglehold and made her way to the podium , hitching up her dress and putting on her very best smile for the tridvid sages .
How she managed to find a smile for Ivo when she saw him waiting for her in the foyer , she did n't know .
Lurching slowly from side to side , becoming faster and steadier , the Vimy rose into the air followed by cheers from the spectators and smiles from the Vickers team .
This produced an answering smile from her husband .
Royalbion 's most important guests were at the hospitality unit today , hoping for a smile from the Princess .
She produced a smile of pure triumph .
Diana 's smile of delight is truly radiant .
The canteen was like a thousand others , run by unpaid volunteers and makeshift and bare , but the smile of the elderly helper was as bright as her flowered pinafore .
Russell smiled again but Dexter found it impossible to decide whether it was a smile of contemplation , charm or mendacity -- or all three .
The waiter bowed his head slightly lower , a smile of pleasure splitting his face .
Back home , after Alexander had dropped them off and Emily was tucked up fast asleep in bed , Lisa even forced a smile of admiration at his duplicity .
She had to admit that he looked more worried about her than threatening and this brought a small smile of relief to her face .
There was a smile on his face and it was still on his face when he stopped as if seized up and fell headlong in the passageway .
Dinah turned a radiant smile on him .
Holman could almost detect an embittered smile on the pain-wracked face .
He was quite calm , a slight smile on his lips , a kind of self-sufficiency there that Munro had noticed in many airborne soldiers .
McCrea 's smile was infectious .
His cheery smile vanished .
His smile had a bitter edge .
Marcus again smiled what Ludens saw as a mysterious complicit smile , as if Ludens were a talented tempter who was at the same time a fellow initiate .
Stephen bestowed on them his best hospitality smile .
` Style , " she replied , throwing her long fair hair over her shoulders and flashing him the toothpaste smile again .
I shall always remember that self deprecating smile and ironic phrase which I liked so much .
“ I must indeed apologize for my … irritation , ” he said and produced his most disarming smile .
His mouth was curved in a hard , mocking smile .
Oblivious of the anger that crackled in the air , she cast a welcoming smile in Jake 's direction .
Bang on cue , she strode out on to the stage , feeling none of the terror that had crippled her last performance , the excited cheers of the children bringing a beaming smile to her face .
But it also brought a smile to manager Brian Horton , and I was thrilled to bits for him because he 's taken a lot of stick over recent results .
Luch looked over at Hector for his smile before bowing grave thanks .
She could n't prevent a tiny ironic smile from curving her lips .
A sly smile touched the comers of her mouth .
She was beginning another song now , a happy smile turning up the corners of her mouth .
A rare smile crept over Trepolov 's lips , but it did not reach his eyes , Auguste noticed .
She turned questioning eyes towards him while a forced smile played about her lips .
There were no smiles , no ritual handshakes .
Not that Yuri need have fretted for a moment -- as the softer shape emerged , a big smile spread across his strong features .
FOR as long as most people can remember , the stocky figure , big head and proud , tight smile of Jordan 's King Hussein have symbolised stability in the wildness of the Middle East .
There was a big smile on Dickon 's honest face .
He gave her a big , warm , encouraging smile .
There was a big smile on Jim Wagstaff 's face as he arrived in the Maternity Ward at the Princess Margaret Hospital in Swindon .
It was Ludovico de Severi da Bologna , the Latin Patriarch of Antioch ; and Nicholas , animated once again , was bestowing one of his broad , well-meaning smiles on the fellow .
Then a broad smile crossed her face .
He could not resist a faint smile creeping over his face .
A very faint smile came to her eyes and she looked at him , or into him , in a way that was open and deep and held him quite still .
There was the faintest of smiles on Ben 's lips .
Yet Meredith detected a faint smile of triumph on his face .
She turned and flashed a smile at Meg ; her teeth were large and yellow like the donkeys ' .
Depositing the letters in front of him , and waiting until the younger girl had placed the tray on his desk , she flashed a dazzling smile at him , then retreated .
She flashed him a false smile of congratulation .
The ghost of a smile flitted across her sad features .
The ghost of a smile glimmered in his eyes .
` No , " Hamish said , though a hint of a smile crossed his dour face .
This would raise a wry smile from the Dutch manager , Thijs Libregts , who is finding it hard to discover a matching pair .
Her mother raised her eyebrows , slanting a wry smile at her guest .
Flora returned the smile .
The faintest shadow of a smile flickered across his lips , quickly controlled .
When it was over , and the house lights went up , there was a sort of bemused smile on the collective face of the audience .
There was n't a trace of the sardonic about Pascoe 's smile .
When sentence had been passed he glanced at her and was sure he could see the trace of a smile on her lips .
A trace of a smile touched those hard lips .
A shadow of apprehension crossed her face , immediately replaced by a warm and welcoming smile .
` Everything I 've always wanted , " she answered gently , her warm smile lighting her whole face .
Glancing up , she caught Ross 's nod and warm smile of approval at the efforts she was making to reassure Emma and Sophie about their parents ' condition .
( This may provoke wry smiles amongst anyone familiar with The Sunday People 's weekly diet of sex-op housewives and randy vicars . )
She managed a wry smile , pushing her hair away from her face and rubbing her eyes .
Then Khrushchev beamed a wide infectious smile , of the kind with which Winston Churchill and Aneurin Bevan used to charm their audiences .
BRAVE Princess Diana put two weeks of torment behind her yesterday … and beamed this smile of relief .
Mada Joyce suddenly nodded and gave a smile of understanding .
Harry gave him a friendly smile .
He had a smile on his face as we shook hands .
She 's always had a smile for me , Mr Feather . "
The child 's face , shiny with butter and dotted with toastcrumbs , folded up in a huge smile .
Then he looked up at Fei Yen , his strong features formed into a smile of pleasure .
Now me , I 'm firmly on Ana 's side , " she finished as Ana walked into the room with a smile on her face .
The fellow smiled a broad toothless smile , looking from Beth to his companion , then back again .
He smiled his winning smile .
I wear an amazed smile on my face .
